rollback.comment: Drop all tables and schema objects
rollback.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TIB_AUDIT_TEC.TT_TRANSPORT CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TIB_AUDIT_TEC.REF_TRANSPORT CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TIB_AUDIT_TEC.TT_FLOW CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TIB_AUDIT_TEC.REF_FLOW CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS TIB_AUDIT_TEC.TT_ERRORS CASCADE;
